item.title: 台积电面临被腾讯超越成为亚洲最大公司的风险
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. risks giving up its lead over Tencent Holdings Ltd. as Asia’s biggest company by market value, with investors focused on the latter’s artificial intelligence plans.】

item.title: 台湾在权衡特朗普和人工智能的不确定性后将维持关键利率不变
item.description: 台湾可能会将其关键政策利率维持在 2008 年以来的最高水平，因为政策制定者要考虑特朗普政府可能征收的芯片关税、人工智能狂潮的前景以及通货膨胀。【原文：Taiwan will likely keep its key policy rate at the highest level since 2008 as policymakers consider potential chip tariffs from the Trump administration, the outlook for the AI frenzy and inflation.】

item.title: 鲍威尔淡化日益增长的风险，认为关税影响只是暂时的
item.description: 数周以来，美国经济形势一直暗流涌动。如果说周三是美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔敲响警钟的机会，那么他却硬生生地放弃了。【原文：For weeks the US economic picture has been darkening. If Wednesday was an opportunity for Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell to raise the alarm, he took a hard pass.】

item.title: 英格兰银行准备采取鹰派倾向：决策指南
item.description: 随着官员们开始担心唐纳德-特朗普关税战的影响以及国内通胀的重新抬头，英国央行周四的态度可能会变得不那么鸽派。【原文：The Bank of England is likely to turn less dovish on Thursday as officials start to fret about the fallout from Donald Trump’s tariff wars and a renewed bout of domestic inflation.】

item.title: 哈利法克斯（Halifax）称，英国首次购房者在借贷便宜的情况下激增
item.description: 最新分析显示，由于借贷成本的降低使人们更能负担得起房屋贷款，去年英国首次购房者在房屋贷款中所占的比例创下了历史新高。【原文：UK first-time buyers made up a record share of home loans last year as easing borrowing costs made houses more affordable, according to new analysis.】

item.title: 美国经济增长前景与库存水平成为关注焦点，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 美联储维持利率不变后，美国经济增长前景成为关注焦点，同时数据显示燃料消费强劲，石油价格企稳。【原文：Oil steadied, with the outlook for US growth in focus after the Federal Reserve left rates unchanged, while data showed robust fuel consumption.】

item.title: 软银以 65 亿美元收购芯片设计公司 Ampere
item.description: 软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp）已同意收购半导体设计公司 Ampere Computing LLC，此举进一步扩大了这家日本投资公司在人工智能基础设施领域的推进力度。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. has agreed to acquire semiconductor designer Ampere Computing LLC in a move that further broadens the Japanese investment firm’s push into artificial intelligence infrastructure.】

item.title: 菲律宾央行行长预计 4 月降息，关税影响不大
item.description: 菲律宾央行行长伊莱-雷莫洛纳（Eli Remolona）表示，菲律宾央行可能将在下个月恢复宽松货币政策，美国关税可能只会对这个东南亚国家的经济产生 "适度 "影响。【原文：The Philippine central bank will likely resume monetary policy easing next month, Governor Eli Remolona said, with US tariffs likely to have only a “modest” impact on the Southeast Asian nation’s economy.】

item.title: 石油高管在特朗普会议上只谈许可不谈价格
item.description: 内政部长道格-伯格姆（Doug Burgum）表示，在周三与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的会晤中，石油高管们要求加快审批速度，但并未讨论对原油价格下跌的担忧。【原文：Oil executives pressed for faster permitting — and didn’t discuss concerns about falling crude prices — during a meeting with President Donald Trump on Wednesday, Interior Secretary Doug Burgum said.】

item.title: 汇丰银行对亚洲主要部门进行改革，女性担任高级职位的成本增加
item.description: 汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）在全球范围内进行全面改革，要求管理人员重新申请合并后的企业和机构银行部门的高级职位，这导致亚洲的女性高管落选。【原文：A global overhaul at HSBC Holdings Plc has seen female executives in Asia lose out after the lender asked managers to reapply for senior roles in the combined corporate and institutional banking unit.】

item.title: 交易不确定性令长江和记在财报发布前押注飙升
item.description: 自从长江和记实业控股有限公司（CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd.）的大宗港口交易被披露以来，投资者将期权押注提高到了八年来的最高点。现在，在这家香港企业集团准备于周四晚些时候公布财报之际，投资者正等待着有关这笔交易的更多线索。【原文：Since CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd.’s blockbuster ports deal was revealed, investors have boosted options bets to an eight-year high. Now they’re waiting for more clues on the sale as the Hong Kong conglomerate readies to report earnings later Thursday.】

item.title: 印尼抛售，东南亚避风港赌局分崩离析
item.description: 东南亚曾被誉为投资者避开唐纳德-特朗普关税战的天堂，但随着整个地区股市溃败的加深，东南亚几乎失去了这种吸引力。【原文：Once touted as a haven for investors to navigate Donald Trump’s tariff wars, Southeast Asia has all but lost that appeal as a region-wide stock rout deepens.】

item.title: 中国人工智能初创企业 Manycore 在美国紧张局势中向全球进军
item.description: 尽管华盛顿和中国政府之间的紧张关系给中国公司开发尖端技术并将其推向海外市场带来了越来越多的挑战，但中国的人工智能初创公司Manycore Tech Inc.仍热衷于扩大其全球业务。【原文：China’s AI startup Manycore Tech Inc. is keen to grow its global presence, despite tensions between Washington and Beijing presenting increasing challenges for Chinese companies to build cutting-edge technologies and market them abroad.】

item.title: 美联储平息关税紧张情绪后亚洲股市将上涨：市场综述
item.description: 鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）安抚了对关税心存疑虑的投资者，表示美联储认为没有必要在唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战面前采取激烈行动，亚洲股市随华尔街的反弹而攀升。【原文：Asian stocks were set to climb following a rally on Wall Street as Jerome Powell calmed tariff-wary investors, signaling the Federal Reserve saw no need for drastic action in the face of Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 人工智能云计算公司 CoreWeave 寻求约 25 亿美元的 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，作为人工智能领域最热门的初创企业之一，云计算供应商 CoreWeave Inc.【原文：CoreWeave Inc., a cloud-computing provider that’s one of the hottest startups in artificial intelligence, and some of its investors are seeking to raise about $2.5 billion at the midpoint of a marketed range in an initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 降息刺激增长反弹，新西兰走出衰退
item.description: 在中央银行开始降息之后，新西兰经济在 2024 年底走出衰退，第四季度的增长强于预期。【原文：New Zealand’s economy exited recession at the end of 2024, posting stronger-than-expected growth in the fourth quarter after the central bank began to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 巴西将主要利率上调至 14.25%，并预计未来将小幅加息
item.description: 巴西央行在连续第三次会议上将利率上调了整整一个百分点，并表示将在下一次会议上再次上调利率，但幅度较小，因为央行寻求为经济降温，并抑制通胀压力的爆发。【原文：Brazil’s central bank raised its interest rate by a full percentage point for the third straight meeting and indicated that they would deliver another hike of a smaller magnitude at their next gathering, as they seek to cool the economy and tame a burst of inflationary pressure.】

item.title: 奥古斯塔国家公园工人因盗窃美国名人赛纪念品被判入狱
item.description: 奥古斯塔国家高尔夫俱乐部（Augusta National Golf Club）的一名前雇员因盗窃高尔夫大师赛的商品而被判处一年监禁，他在大约 13 年的时间里通过网络将这些商品以数百万美元的价格卖给了网络中间商。【原文：A former employee of the Augusta National Golf Club was sentenced to one year in prison for stealing Masters golf tournament merchandise that he sold online for millions of dollars to online brokers over about 13 years.】

item.title: 鲍威尔就关税通胀发表讲话，重提 "过渡性
item.description: Transitory 团队似乎正在卷土重来。【原文：Team Transitory looks to be staging a comeback.】

item.title: 新一轮 "中国冲击 "正在摧毁世界各地的就业机会
item.description:
从印度尼西亚到墨西哥，随着特朗普的关税措施将更多的中国出口商品从美国转移出去，就业损失可能会增加。【原文：

From Indonesia to Mexico, job losses could mount as Trump’s tariffs divert even more Chinese exports from the US.

】

item.title: H&F 选择高盛和摩根士丹利进行 Verisure IPO
item.description: 知情人士透露，私募股权公司 Hellman & Friedman 已选择银行主导安全集团 Verisure 的首次公开募股，这可能是近年来欧洲最大的上市项目之一。【原文：Private equity firm Hellman & Friedman has selected banks to lead the initial public offering of security group Verisure, potentially one of the largest listings in Europe in recent years, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 鲍威尔对经济作出保证，被打压的股票牛市重新跃起
item.description: 经济衰退的几率虽然较高，但并不令人担忧。通胀虽然依然严峻，但并不值得担忧。贸易政策呢？到了明朗的时候就会清楚了。美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔说，简而言之，没有理由对当前的货币政策路径采取任何行动。【原文：Recession odds, while higher, aren’t alarming. Inflation, while still sticky, isn’t worth fretting over. And trade policy? It’ll become clear when it becomes clear. In short, Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said, there’s no reason to do anything with the current path of monetary policy.】

item.title: CVC 有意收购穆巴达拉支持的 Fortress
item.description: 据知情人士透露，CVC Capital Partners 有意收购 Fortress Investment Group，以拓展私人信贷业务。【原文：CVC Capital Partners is interested in acquiring Fortress Investment Group, according to people with knowledge of the matter, as it seeks to expand in private credit.】

item.title: 国会支持米莱伊支持国际货币基金组织阿根廷新协议的法令
item.description: 阿根廷国会下议院支持哈维尔-米莱总统的紧急行政令，支持与国际货币基金组织达成一项新协议，这是一个关键的立法步骤，为正式宣布未来计划的细节扫清了道路。【原文：Argentina’s lower house of Congress upheld President Javier Milei’s emergency executive decree backing a new deal with the International Monetary Fund, a key legislative step that clears the way for a formal announcement on the details of a future program.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚能源部长称富人应偿还电力债务
item.description: 哥伦比亚能源部长埃德温-帕尔马（Edwin Palma）提议，由收入较高的家庭和公司承担政府拖欠电力经销商的债务，这些债务已导致一些电力公司面临停产风险。【原文：Colombia Energy Minister Edwin Palma proposed that higher-income households and companies assume the debt owed by the government to power distributors that has left some utilities at risk of shutting down.】

item.title: 美联储维持利率不变后，美国信贷风险指数进一步回落
item.description: 在美联储官员连续第二次会议维持基准利率不变后，跟踪信贷违约风险的衍生品指数有所回落，股市走高。【原文：Derivative indexes that track credit default risk eased and stocks edged higher after the Federal Reserve officials held the benchmark interest rate steady for a second straight meeting.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）新协议临近，阿根廷经济延续扩张态势
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）在2024年底实现了连续第二个季度的经济增长，这提高了他在今年晚些时候举行的中期选举中取得好成绩的可能性，因为市场正在等待与国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）达成新的计划。【原文：President Javier Milei oversaw a second straight quarter of growth in Argentina at the end of 2024, boosting his odds of a strong showing in mid-term elections later this year as markets await a new program with the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 道达尔能源为欧洲炼油厂提供巴西绿色氢气
item.description: 道达尔能源 SE 正在考虑从巴西东北部正在开发的一个价值数十亿美元的项目中进口绿色氢气，以供应其欧洲炼油厂。【原文：TotalEnergies SE is considering importing green hydrogen from a multi-billion dollar project under development in northeastern Brazil to supply its European refineries.】

item.title: Codelco 希望借助弗里德兰公司的脉冲电源提高智利矿山的效率
item.description: 世界最大的铜生产商 Codelco 公司正在考虑采用罗伯特-弗里德兰德的 I-Pulse 公司开发的技术，该技术利用电力击碎岩石。【原文：Codelco, the world’s biggest copper producer, is considering adopting technology being developed by Robert Friedland’s I-Pulse Inc. that uses electricity to shatter rocks.】

item.title: 被特斯拉空头押注烧毁的对冲基金计划下一步行动
item.description: 对冲基金在 11 月 5 日大选后对特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Hedge funds whose short positions against Tesla Inc. backfired badly after the Nov. 5 election are watching the latest selloff from the sidelines, for fear of being burned again.】
